newsSection.title: News & Announcements
newsSection.subtitle: Stay updated with our latest initiatives, publications, and community engagements

1.title: NSPC Annual Conference 2026 Announced
1.excerpt: Join us for the biggest event of the year featuring keynote speakers, workshops, and networking opportunities for students nationwide.
1.subtitle: Keynotes • Workshops • Networking — Feb 2026

2.title: New Scholarship Program Launched
2.excerpt: NSPC introduces a comprehensive scholarship program to support outstanding students in their academic pursuits and leadership development.
2.subtitle: Financial support and mentorship for high-achieving students

3.title: Student Leadership Summit Success
3.excerpt: Over 500 students participated in the recent leadership summit, learning essential skills for future community impact.
3.subtitle: Highlights and outcomes from the 2025 summit

4.title: Community Outreach Initiative Update
4.excerpt: Our members have contributed over 10,000 volunteer hours to local communities, making a significant positive impact.
4.subtitle: Volunteering impact across regions

outreach-2026.title: Community Outreach Initiative Expanded in 2026
outreach-2026.excerpt: Our members contributed over 12,000 volunteer hours across regions, expanding community support and services.
outreach-2026.subtitle: Volunteer engagement and impact — 2026

report-2025.title: Annual Social Protection Report 2025 Released
report-2025.excerpt: The 2025 report highlights progress, challenges, and recommendations for strengthening social protection systems nationwide.
report-2025.subtitle: Key findings and recommendations — 2025

consultation-2025.title: Public Consultation on Policy Updates
consultation-2025.excerpt: Stakeholders participated in a series of consultations to inform upcoming policy reforms and enhance stakeholder engagement.
consultation-2025.subtitle: Consultation outcomes — 2025

5.title: Partnership with National Universities
5.excerpt: NSPC announces strategic partnerships with leading universities to enhance educational opportunities for our members.
5.subtitle: New collaborations to expand learning pathways

6.title: Youth Empowerment Workshop Series
6.excerpt: Join our monthly workshop series designed to equip young leaders with skills in communication, project management, and advocacy.
6.subtitle: Monthly workshops for skill-building and leadership
